body.name: LED Desk Lamp with USB Charging Port, Touch Control Dimmable Office Lamp, 5 Color Modes 6 Brightness Levels Eye-Caring Table Lamp for Home Office Bedroom Reading Study, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 12 mins
features: Eye-caring LED Desk Lamp. This LED desk lamp features 5 color modes ranging from warm yellow to cold white, delivering low heat, low glare illumination to help reduce eyestrain and protect your eyes.

Touch Control. Sliding touch control design located at the base of the table lamp allows you to control the 6 brightness levels effortlessly, offering the best light you need for all desk-oriented work. And 1-hour auto timer helps electricity saving.

USB Charging Port. This desk lamp comes with a USB port delivering 5V/1A charging power to charge your phone, e-reader, or USB fan. No need to disturb your studying to find another outlet, a bonus for your long-hours concentrated reading.

Exceptional Quality. Made of top-grade metal and plastic for better heat dissipation and extended lifespan, this LED lamp is constructed for extraordinary reliability and durability. Approved by FCC/CE/ROHS/PSE, you could have a rest-assured use.

Exquisite Design. Elegant black color offers modern and stylish good looks to match with a variety of décor styles, and foldable neck design makes it not take much space when not in use. This desk lamp is great for your home, dorm, or office use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MONGERY: Light Your Life This LED table lamp is your best companion for reading, studying, crafting, video conferencing, crafting, and all desk-central work, featuring 6 brightness levels & 5 color modes of warm-yellow-natural color-white-cold white. You could set the perfect light you need via the sliding touch control with the touch of your finger. And a 1-hour timer allows you to schedule the power-off.

You can easily adjust brightness levels or color temperatures, and then you will find one mode that is suitable for you. Surprisingly, the desk lamp possesses a memory function, it can remember the setting and automatically return to the setting when turned on next time.

Eye-Caring MONGERY desk lamp comes with no light for shadow/dizzying/unnecessary flash, flicker-free LED protects your eyes and effectively avoids fatigue. Help you focus on working. Auto-Off Timer The desk lamp can automatically turn off after one hour if you set the timer in advance. You can sleep in peace. Use it Wherever You Like The desk lamp is suitable for a series of occasions. It can light up your life better while you’re doing what you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good.. includes AC adapter
reviews.reviewText: This is similar to some $39 lamps I've bought from Taotronics.It has 6 color temperature settings, is made of metal, and includes ac adapter (unlike some that now just have a USB plug).The only thing I didn't like is you can't read the touch controls because they are black on black.I had to put a white piece of tape over the "ON" button so I can find it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LED lamp review
reviews.reviewText: I got this to put on my nightstand next to my bed. It is perfect as a reading light with 3 different colors of light and 5 adjustments from low to high. I really like the ability to tilt the light source to direct the light. I have also used the timer to allow the light to turn itself off after one hour. The built in phone charger has been "hit or miss" for me. It may be that I did not set the phone squarely on the base. It charges slowly and takes all night on the charger to reach 100% on my phone. Also, the "on/off" touch bottom is right on the edge of where the phone sits on the base. I have picked up the phone in the middle of the night to check the time and I inadvertently swiped the light "on" button so the light blasts in my face. Again, more than likely "user operator error". I am more careful picking up my phone from the base charger. Good solid metal construction. Nice LED light bar. Overall a quality item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very versatile desk lamp - wireless charger
reviews.reviewText: Really nice desk lamp. Has six brightness levels and 5 color temperatures. There are two sets of LEDs - warm and cool. It on the middle three settings it blends them at different brightness levels.Photos show light at brightest and dimmest setting on "cool" light, brightest setting at warm light, the most upright position it can go in, and the lowest position it can go in (without tipping over).This has a 12 volt 2 amp DC wall adapter. It appears to have a standard size barrel jack, so with an adapter you could likely run it off the 12 volt DC of a vehicle or RV.Cons of the light are: USB output is only 1 amp and the wireless charger can get hot while charging my iPhone 12 Pro MAX (but my phone is almost 3 years old, has been dropped hundreds of times, and is in a thick Otterbox defender pro case).Besides the two cons above (and the 2nd is possibly my phone), I really like this lamp and recommend it.i

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value lamp
reviews.reviewText: I am quite impressed by this LED lamp and it turned out to be much better than expected at this price. The lamp is very well made and feels like a professional unit, in part being constructed of aluminum. It looks quite stylish and looks great on the desk where it now proudly sits. The unit is powered by a small power supply and once plugged in, the lamp is turned on with a touch of a capacitive touch On/Off pad on the base of the unit. If I were to have one small gripe it would be to have the On/Off pad illuminated as it is hard to see in a dimly lit room when trying to hit it with a finger, but after a few uses I figured I could just use my palm on the base and that turned it on or off which turned out was much easier. There are a good range of color choices and each one can be dimmed in increments.On testing the wireless charging pad with my Samsung S22 I was surprised to see it indicate it had switched to fast charging! Again I didn't expect to see this at this price. There is also a USB outlet for wired charging.Overall I love this very functional stylish lamp and at this price it is a steal!Highly recommended, 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I genuinely was shocked at how good of a find this way
reviews.reviewText: I have to share my excitement about this desk lamp I recently got. I was on the hunt for a lamp that ticked specific boxes for me: swiveling closed, LED, and a good light range. This lamp not only met my criteria but exceeded my expectations!To my astonishment, its Qi Charger managed to power up my wife's iPhone, even with her Oh Snap Otterbox and the magnet on—a genuinely impressive feat! And yes, it charged our AirPods seamlessly too.The lighting options are versatile, offering multiple dim settings and temperatures. The controls are conveniently located on the base of the lamp and are super intuitive. The swivel feature is exceptional, directing light wherever needed. I've uploaded some photos taken at night, showcasing the contrast between the lamp's 'cool' illumination and the room's 'warm' ambiance.As you can see, all the controls are small impression pressure points on the base that react to what you need. It even has a '1-hour mode' which could be great as a forced 'study timeout', or reminder to go walk around and stretch.A bonus is the USB input on the base, perfect for an extra charge or powering a device. While it's USB-a and won't deliver fast charging, it's still a valuable feature for providing power.In conclusion, this lamp is a delightful discovery, and I can wholeheartedly endorse it. Imagine finding such a lamp by your hotel bed – what a treat that would be!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great style and Great features
reviews.reviewText: This lamp has great styling and takes a minimal amount of table space. There is a lot of adjustment range for the lamp arms but leaning it too far forward will tip it over.The lower arm adjusts from parallel with the desk to fully vertical and stays in place by friction only, there is no locking or friction adjustment system.The upper arm adjusts from parallel to the lower arm all the way to almost 180 degrees. It also stays in place by friction with no locking or friction adjustment system.Both of the arms on my unit stayed perfectly in place at all positions.The color temperature and brightness settings on this light are great features. I love the slide adjustment for brightness.The timer is a nice feature although I don't expect to ever use it.The wireless charger worked really well with my Samsung S23 Plus phone and had plenty of room to fit this or even larger phones. The target zone was larger than expected so the phone didn't need to land precisely in order to charge.The lower arm is about 14" long and the upper arm is about 13" long. The base is 7" diameter and about 3/4" thick.
